_comment: This file maps config variables with environment variables set on machine.
_comment1: Here, 'db' config variable is mapped with 'classroom_db' env variable.
_comment2: So you need to create env variable using 'set', or else it will take the value from default.js
_comment3: This way your db connection will remain secret from code base, stored in env var on machine
_comment4: you can set this connection string to classroom_db - mongodb+srv://abcd1234:abcd1234@cluster0-absuk.mongodb.net/test?retryWrites=true&w=majority ...But dont mention this in real applications.
